merpi_desc: %USER's biter, it's used for biting, nibbling, gnawing and nomming!

merpi_flowery: %USER puts %TARGET's %T_PART into their jaws, sinking a bite down into it firmly as if latching on for dear life like they're going for the kill!!
%USER teases nibbles across %TARGET's %T_PART, leaving small affectionate pressure pricks along the %T_PART as they explore their body!
%USER bites into %TARGET's %T_PART playfully, a soft laugh escaping from their mouth as they do so.  It's clear they're enjoying the tasty snack!
%USER softly sinks their teeth into %TARGET's %T_PART, looking towards their face to gauge the reaction as they impishly shake the %T_PART!
%USER chomps down hard on %TARGET's %T_PART, their sharp teeth pressing into the %T_PART noticably as they let out a soft laugh of pleasure!
%USER presses their bite down into %TARGET's %T_PART, holding on firmly to the %T_PART as if their life depends on it!
%USER repeatedly gnaws on %TARGET's %T_PART, like an dog chewing on a bone.  Over and over they sink their teeth into the %T_PART relentlessly!
%USER breaks the skin, a small trickle of blood coming from %TARGET's %T_PART as the biter breaths through their nostrils!

merpi_normal: %USER bites down hard on %TARGET's %T_PART, nearly drawing blood!
merpi_flowery: %USER downright CHOMPS into %TARGET's %T_PART, breaking skin and latching on like an animal seeking a meal! That'll leave a mark!
